code: /**  * Return the wrapped SQLException.  */ public SQLException getSQLException() {     return (SQLException) getCause(). }

comment: /**  * Return the SQL that caused the problem.  * @return the offending SQL, if known  */
code: /**  * Return the SQL that caused the problem.  * @return the offending SQL, if known  */ @Nullable public String getSql() {     return this.sql. }
